metadata.name: two are still hanging out
metadata.description:
“This foray takes the viewer to a place where the metropolis takes a breather.”

This work shows finds and traces of people living in the Greater Bangkok area. I lead the viewer to places where it seems that the city is resting. Most of the pictures were taken on holidays and Sundays and contrast with the vibrant everyday life of the metropolis. Contrary to the prejudice that big cities are loud, hectic and crowded with people, this foray takes us to places where the city takes a breather.


Project: METROPOLIS SUNDAY / Bangkok Series

Medium: digital photography

Dimensions: 5000 x 5000 pixels

image: (JPEG)

Artist: Matthias Forster

Edition: 1/1

Year: 2013
